## Using R and python in Quarto


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
# Python in Quarto
print('hello world')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
hello world
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# R in Quarto
print("hello world")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "hello world"
```
:::
:::
